title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set.
OB: An error is shown when trying to create a table group without setting a dataset.
EB: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set. Add a table report item without setting the dataset. Try creating a new table group. User should be able to define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Open the report designer.
2. Add a table report item to the design canvas.
3. Do not set a dataset for the table.
4. Try to create a new table group.
5. Verify that the group dialog is shown and user is able to define a group.
